name: I Flew AROUND the WORLD in FIRST CLASS & it ONLY cost £___
description:
This should have cost me A LOT more! I flew the circumference of the earth in the World’s Best First Class Suites!

It honestly was one of the most exciting things I’ve ever done. Departing London, stopping off along the way until I landed back in London a month later. Examples being Emirates First Class, British Airways First Class, Japan Airlines First Class, Delta First Class and Asiana! I stopped off along the way visiting friends and experienced as much of each country as possible during my time there. I’ll share with you in the video exactly how I booked this and how much I paid.
